docs.lead_paragraph: TEEN-AGERS, who have made their mark on music, fashions, education and politics, are asking for and getting their own thing when it comes to medicine. An increasing number of adolescent clinics are springing up about the country, providing thousands of youngsters with sympathetic medical care.
